name: ИППП
description:
Big project on hybrid HTML5-engine: ThreeJS and PixiJS.
PixiJS was used as renderer for Adobe Animate animations in ThreeJS render context.

name: Playble Demo
description:
Reconstruction of popular Homescapes Ad. Simple interactive game on PixiJS v5 with inlined resources into one file.
Total size about 1.5mb.

name: Puffy Budget
description: Simply fun game for ADWISE company on the eve of the 2019 year.

name: Snowflake
description:
Glossy cask with snow.
Particle distribution simulation in closed space with curved-shapes colliding checking.
Uses image distortion filter for glass effect imitation between midleground and foreground.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: DragonBones (Spine alt.) was be used for fruits animation on start page.
